faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ASWAQ Online

createListing.question: How do I create a listing?
createListing.answer: Creating a listing is simple! Click the 'Sell' button, choose your category, fill in the details, add photos, and publish. Free tier users can post up to 3 listings.

listingDuration.question: How long do listings stay active?
listingDuration.answer: Listing duration depends on your package. Free listings last 30 days, while paid packages offer extended durations plus bonus days.

featuredListing.question: Is featured listing worth it?
featuredListing.answer: Featured listings appear on the homepage and are designed to get more views. It's perfect for items you want to sell quickly.

verifiedSeller.question: How do I become a verified seller?
verifiedSeller.answer: Complete your profile, verify your contact information, and maintain a positive rating. Verified sellers will enjoy higher visibility and trust.

support.title: Need Help?
support.subtitle: Our support team is here to assist you 24/7

about.heroTitle: Seamless connections between buyers and sellers
about.buildingContent: Abdul gathered a dedicated team of developers, marketers, and logistics experts. They worked hard to turn his vision into reality, aiming to make the digital marketplace accessible not only in affluent cities but also in remote towns. Their mission was to combine the rich cultural heritage of the Middle East with modern technology, crafting a unique e-commerce experience that was both local and globally competitive.
about.coverageTitle: ASWAQ in the Middle East and North Africa.

customerTrust.title: Customer Trust
customerTrust.content: Ensuring secure transactions, protecting user data, and providing reliable customer service.

userExperience.title: User Experience
userExperience.content: Offering a seamless, intuitive, and enjoyable shopping experience, from browsing to checkout.

culturalRelevance.title: Cultural Relevance
culturalRelevance.content: Understanding and incorporating local customs, preferences, and languages to resonate with the target audience.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.description: Our team is here to help with any questions you might have about using Aswaq Online. Whether you need assistance with your account, listings, or have feedback to share, we're just a message away.
